title: 命令方块
author: Nerey
txt_content: 命令方块可以弄西瓜头，什么的？

replies.txt_content: 1.8版本才可以，西瓜头，命令/replaceitem entity @e[type=Player,c=1] slot.armor.head minecraft:melon 1 0 {}

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content:
来自楼上   1.8的
/replaceitem entity @e[type=Player,c=1] slot.armor.head minecraft:melon 1 0
可能会有人用西瓜的头的皮肤
那么试试这个
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-211885-1-1.html
